title: Apartment #13
description: Valerie is a High-profile criminal lawyer and a married woman with a secret: A sordid affair with the stranger she thought was her sleep-paralysis demon; Drac. Except she doesn’t know if he’s real or just a figment of her imagination. Her life starts to unravel and so does her mind when her dreams begin to feel like reality… But she can’t stop seeing him. She doesn’t want to.Fantasy or Reality? Sometimes the line gets a little blurry in Apartment #13.Trigger Warnings 18+
author: Shantaye Brown
